languages.text: "Хочешь убедить меня в том, что мон-кай, пусть и выдрессированные, способны разгадывать замыслы {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}? За подобную наглость расплачиваться придется и тебе, и твоему "другу".

traits.locale_text: "Хочешь убедить меня в том, что мон-кай, пусть и выдрессированные, способны разгадывать замыслы друкари? За подобную наглость раплачиваться придется и тебе, и твоему "другу".

languages.text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь убедить меня в том, что мон-кай, пусть и выдрессированные, способны разгадывать замыслы {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}? За подобную наглость расплачиваться придется и тебе, и твоему "другу".

traits.locale_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the Drukhari? The payment for this audacity will be exacted both from you and your 'friend.'"

"Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the Drukhari? The payment for this audacity will be exacted both from you and your 'friend.'"

"Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

"Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

"Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

languages.text: «¿Intentas convencerme de que un mon-keigh, por mucho que sea una de tus mascotas mon-keigh bien entrenadas, es capaz de comprender los designios de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Tu "amigo" y tú pagaréis cara esta osadía».
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

traits.locale_text: «¿Intentas convencerme de que un mon-keigh, por mucho que sea una de tus mascotas mon-keigh bien entrenadas, es capaz de comprender los designios de los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Tu "amigo" y tú pagaréis cara esta osadía».

languages.text: “哪怕是训练有素的猴子，也仅仅是猴子而已。你是打算让我以为，一只猴子居然能看穿{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}的计划吗？你和你的‘朋友’都要为这种傲慢付出代价。”
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

traits.locale_text: “哪怕是训练有素的猴子，也仅仅是猴子而已。你是打算让我以为，一只猴子居然能看穿{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}的计划吗？你和你的‘朋友’都要为这种傲慢付出代价。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイの分際で、いや、それどころか訓練されたモン＝ケイのしもべごときが{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}の計画を知覚することができると言いたいのか？貴様も貴様の『友人』とやらも、その厚かましさの代償を払うことになるぞ」
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイの分際で、いや、それどころか訓練されたモン＝ケイのしもべごときが{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}の計画を知覚することができると言いたいのか？貴様も貴様の"友人"とやらも、その厚かましさの代償を払うことになるぞ」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mir weismachen, dass ein Chem-Pan-Sey, auch wenn er ein gut trainiertes Haustier ist, die Pläne der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} durchschauen kann? Ihr und Euer 'Freund' werdet für diese unverschämte Anmaßung bezahlen."
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mir weismachen, dass ein Chem-Pan-Sey, auch wenn er ein gut trainiertes Haustier ist, die Pläne der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} durchschauen kann? Ihr und Euer 'Freund' werdet für diese unverschämte Anmaßung bezahlen."

languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the Drukhari? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

languages.text: « Essayez-vous de me faire croire qu'un simple serviteur mon-keigh, aussi bien dressé qu'il soit, est capable de percevoir les desseins des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} ? Vous et votre "ami" paierez pour cette audace. »
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

traits.locale_text: « Essayez-vous de me faire croire qu'un simple serviteur mon-keigh, aussi bien dressé qu'il soit, est capable de percevoir les desseins des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} ? Vous et votre "ami" paierez pour cette audace. »

languages.text: "Bir mon-keigh ve eğittiği evcil hayvanı nasıl {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari'nin{/g} tasarılarını algılayabilecek kapasitede olabilir? Sen ve 'dostun', buna cüret ettiğiniz için hesap vereceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to convince me that a mon-keigh, even a well-trained mon-keigh pet, is capable of perceiving the designs of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}? Both you and your 'friend' will pay for this audacity."

traits.locale_text: "Bir mon-keigh ve eğittiği evcil hayvanı nasıl {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}'nin tasarılarını algılayabilecek kapasitede olabilir? Sen ve 'dostun', buna cüret ettiğiniz için hesap vereceksiniz."
